snippet.title: Trespassers - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
~The nuclear apocalypse embodied by two idiots~
+ 6 Oct 2017 on Steam!

While they were lost drinking in the outskirts, the nuclear apocalypse erased almost the entire city. Now, Danny Destroyer and Kurt Karnage will try to restore civilization as they think it should be: beers, no gov buildings, sick dudes safe... And, obviously, Monique Maxisexy, who may be in danger Shoot the baddies, pick the weapons, kill the bosses, upgrade the guns, get equipped and fight your way to the core of the city in this fast-paced action shoot 'em up.
